long_description: The SOL Thermal bivvy can be used as substitute for a sleeping bag on warm-weather adventures or as an emergency survival bivvy for wintertime activities. Tough 4-ply fabric is windproof and waterproof; material reflects up to 80% of your body heat back to you. Works well as a lightweight substitute for a sleeping bag when nighttime temperatures are 50degF or above. Foot vent and large opening at the top keep you from getting too hot. Reusable SOL Thermal bivvy comes packed in a stuff sack; packs down to 6.5 in. x 7 in.
